meanings.definition: Relating to the lower back and sacrum.
meanings.sent1: The lumbosacral area of the spine is important for supporting the body.
meanings.sent2: She felt a dull ache in her lumbosacral region after lifting heavy boxes.
meanings.sent3: The lumbosacral support belt made him look like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: Her lumbosacral strength was the foundation of her physical prowess.
meanings.sent5: The lumbosacral connection is crucial for maintaining balance and stability.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the lumbar and sacral regions of the spine.
meanings.sent1: The lumbosacral nerves play a key role in transmitting signals to the brain.
meanings.sent2: He underwent surgery to address a lumbosacral disc herniation.
meanings.sent3: The lumbosacral fusion surgery gave him a new lease on life.
meanings.sent4: The lumbosacral junction is where the two regions meet in the spine.
meanings.sent5: Her lumbosacral flexibility allowed her to bend and stretch with ease.
